As an employer or industry member, you can engage with#TLevelqualifications in many ways. T Levels are built around the same set of employer-led standards as apprenticeships, which puts businesses at their core.

- un dx dyslexic/ASC “slow” at school
- married at 19, dad at 21
- night school,City & Guilds, taught himself C++
- started bagpipes in 30s
- can do *anything* he tries
- survived results of un dx ASC
- surviving Parkinsons
- the best grandad, hands down.

More than one thing.
